channel.title: Items in correct spot
channel.description:
yo - ive got all the cache packed items now and some stuff dont go into the correct slot - for e.g. i wear dragon platebody and it goes into the weapon slot
help and you can be mod on my server - no its not hamachi because were awesome :p

item.title: Items in correct spot
item.dc:creator: @JoesServers JoesServers
item.description:
@JoesServers wrote:

yeh ive done it now but the arms on the plate body dont show any ive put it in the body[] one so is there a different one i should put it in to

Read full topic

item.title: Items in correct spot
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“JoesServers, post:1, topic:514014”]yo - ive got all the cache packed items now and some stuff dont go into the correct slot - for e.g. i wear dragon platebody and it goes into the weapon slot

help and you can be mod on my server - no its not hamachi because were awesome :p[/quote]
Just find where weaponslots are being handled. For example at least in 718 its in cache. Trace it from wear packet if you can’t find it otherwise

Read full topic

item.title: Items in correct spot
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

First don’t offer stuff for help, and second do you have a method that if the items name is “platebody” it goes into “weaponSlot[5]” or whatever it is on PI. If you do just put the id of the item in that method.

Read full topic
